code: var covid19Api={getDefault:function getDefault(){var url='https://api.covid19api.com';return fetch(url);},getAllDate:function getAllDate(){var url='https://api.covid19api.com/all';return fetch(url);},getSummary:function getSummary(){var url='https://api.covid19api.com/summary';return fetch(url);},getCountries:function getCountries(){var url='https://api.covid19api.com/countries';return fetch(url);},getTotalCountries:function getTotalCountries(slugContry){var url='https://api.covid19api.com/total/country/'+slugContry;return fetch(url);},getLiveByCountry:function getLiveByCountry(slugContry){var url='https://api.covid19api.com/live/country/'+slugContry;return fetch(url);},getLiveByCountryStatus:function getLiveByCountryStatus(slugContry,status){var url='https://api.covid19api.com/live/country/'+slugContry+'/status/'+status;return fetch(url);},getDayOneAllStatus:function getDayOneAllStatus(slugContry){var url='https://api.covid19api.com/dayone/country/'+slugContry;return fetch(url);},getTotalDayOneAllStatus:function getTotalDayOneAllStatus(slugContry){var url='https://api.covid19api.com/total/dayone/country/'+slugContry;return fetch(url);},getDayOneStatus:function getDayOneStatus(slugContry,status){var url='https://api.covid19api.com/dayone/country/'+slugContry+'/status/'+status;return fetch(url);},getTotalDayOneStatus:function getTotalDayOneStatus(slugContry,status){var url='https://api.covid19api.com/total/dayone/country/'+slugContry+'/status/'+status;return fetch(url);}};export default covid19Api;
